00002 /*! double*dcovector operator */
00003 inline _dcovector operator*(const double& d, const dcovector& vec)
00004 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00005   dcovector newvec(vec.l);
00006   for(long i=0; i<vec.l; i++){ newvec.array[i] =d*vec.array[i]; }
00007   return _(newvec);
00008 }
